Subject: Re: ???


>From: Cookie <cookie@...>
>
>>From: "Sven Lederhogen" <jokercheese@...>
>>
>>Who made up that rule that we can't send levels to each other??? THIS IS 
>>A GLADIATORS MAILING LIST FOR GODS SAKE!!!!!Aren't we suppose to send 
>
>I'm under the impression Seth meant "don't send levels to the mailing list"
>rather than "don't send levels via e-mail"...

Thanks for the summary, Cookie -- I also believe that's what Seth meant. And
for written reference, FSGames is happy to have people make and distribute
levels -- the game itself is copywrited, including the levels that come with
the game, but you're welcome to distribute the levels you make however you'd
like.

--Tom
